QUESTION
I am working in Saudi Arabia and my family contains my mother, Grand Mother, My wife and Childs. Now I am planning to bring my wife for 2/3 months to Stay with me Making an arrangement to take care my mother and grand mother as well as my children. I want to know is there anything wrong brining my wife? Isn?t it enough If I arrange some one at home to take care of them?

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
